get.description: Get the hash of the alarms. Used by the iFrames to check updates and reload the iframe.
get.summary: Get the hash of the alarms

parameters.description: Alarms to show. Available values: netdata, radarr, lidarr, sonarr, prowlarr, speedtest-tracker, pihole, kavita, kaizoku, changedetectionio, backrest, openarchiver
parameters.name: alarms

parameters.description: Sort alarms in descending order. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: sort_desc

parameters.description: Show only alarms that match or not the regex. Default to true.
parameters.name: regex_include

parameters.description: Show viewed alarms from changedetection.io. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: changedetectionio_show_viewed

get.description: Get the hash of the Cinemark movies. Used by the iFrames to check updates and reload the iframe.
get.summary: Get the hash of the Cinemark movies

parameters.description: The theater IDs to get movies from. It used to be easy to get, but now it's harder. To get it, you need to access the cinemark site, select a theater, open your browser developer console, go to the
parameters.name: theaterIds

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get the hash of the Linkwarden bookmarks. Used by the iFrames to check updates and reload the iframe.
get.summary: Get the hash of the Linkwarden bookmarks

parameters.description: Get bookmarks only from this collection. You can get the collection ID by going to the collection page. The ID should be on the URL. The ID of the default collection **Unorganized** is 1 because the URL is https://domain.com/collections/1.
parameters.name: collectionId

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get the hash of the media releases. Used by the iFrames to check updates and reload the iframe.
get.summary: Get the hash of media releases

parameters.description: Filter movies get from Radarr. Can be 'inCinemas', 'physical', or 'digital'. Defaults to 'inCinemas'
parameters.name: radarrReleaseType

parameters.description: Specify if show unmonitored media. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: showUnmonitored

get.description: Get the hash of the media requests. Used by the iFrames to check updates and reload the iframe.
get.summary: Get the hash of media requests

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Filters for request status and media status. Available values: all, approved, available, pending, processing, unavailable, failed, deleted, completed, allavaliable (showMedia=true). Defaults to all
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Available values: added, modified, mediaAdded (showMedia=true). Defaults to added
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: If specified, only requests from that particular overseerr user ID will be returned.
parameters.name: requestedByOverseerr

parameters.description: If specified, only requests from that particular jellyseerr user ID will be returned.
parameters.name: requestedByJellyseerr

parameters.description: If true, shows the requests' media data, not the requests and media data. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: showMedia

get.description: Get the hash of the Uptime Kuma sites status. Used by the iFrames to check updates and reload the iframe.
get.summary: Get the hash of the Uptime Kuma sites status

parameters.description: You need to create a status page in Uptime Kuma and select which sites/services this status page will show. While creating the status page, it'll request **you** to create a slug, after creating the status page, provide this slug here. This iFrame will show data only of the sites/services of this specific status page!
parameters.name: slug

get.description: Get the hash of the Vikunja tasks. Used by the iFrames to check updates and reload the iframe.
get.summary: Get the hash of the Vikunja tasks

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Project ID to get tasks from. You can get it by going to the project page in Vikunja, the project ID should be on the URL. Example project page URL: https://vikunja.com/projects/2, the project ID is 2. Inbox tasks = 1, Favorite tasks = -1.
parameters.name: project_id

get.description: Returns an iFrame with alarms from multiple sources.

parameters.description: Homarr theme, defaults to light. If it's different from your Homarr theme, the background turns white
parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: API URL used by your browser. Use by the iFrames to check any update, if there is an update, the iFrame reloads. If not specified, the iFrames will never try to reload.
parameters.name: api_url

parameters.description: Alarms to show. Available values: netdata, radarr, lidarr, sonarr, prowlarr, speedtest-tracker, pihole, kavita, kaizoku, changedetectionio, backrest, openarchiver
parameters.name: alarms

parameters.description: Sort alarms in descending order. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: sort_desc

parameters.description: Show only alarms that match or not the regex. Default to true.
parameters.name: regex_include

parameters.description: Show viewed alarms from changedetection.io. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: changedetectionio_show_viewed

get.description: Returns an iFrame with the on display movies in specific Cinemark theaters. I recommend you to get the movies from the theaters of your city.

parameters.description: The theater IDs to get movies from. Access the cinemark site, select a theater, open your browser developer console, go to the
parameters.name: theaterIds

parameters.description: Homarr theme, defaults to light. If it's different from your Homarr theme, the background turns white
parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: API URL used by your browser. Use by the iFrames to check any update, if there is an update, the iFrame reloads. If not specified, the iFrames will never try to reload.
parameters.name: api_url

get.description: Returns an iFrame with Linkwarden bookmarks.

parameters.description: Get bookmarks only from this collection. You can get the collection ID by going to the collection page. The ID should be on the URL. The ID of the default collection **Unorganized** is 1 because the URL is https://domain.com/collections/1.
parameters.name: collectionId

parameters.description: Homarr theme, defaults to light. If it's different from your Homarr theme, the background turns white
parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: API URL used by your browser. Use by the iFrames to check any update, if there is an update, the iFrame reloads. If not specified, the iFrames will never try to reload.
parameters.name: api_url

parameters.description: Background position of each bookmark card. Use '%25' in place of '%', like '50%25 47.2%25' to get '50% 47.2%'. Defaults to 50% 47.2%.
parameters.name: background_position

parameters.description: Background size of each bookmark card. Use '%25' in place of '%'. Defaults to cover.
parameters.name: background_size

parameters.description: Background filter of each bookmark card. Use '%25' in place of '%'. Defaults to brightness(0.3).
parameters.name: background_filter

parameters.description: Wheter to show a button to delete the bookmarks or not. Defaults to 'false'
parameters.name: showDeleteButton

delete.description: Deletes a Linkwarden bookmark. After deleting, the iFrame will reload if the `api_url` query parameter is provided.

parameters.description: The bookmark ID to delete.
parameters.name: linkId

get.description: Returns an iFrame with the media releases of today. The media releases are from Radarr/Sonarr/Lidarr.

parameters.description: Homarr theme, defaults to light. If it's different from your Homarr theme, the background turns white
parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: API URL used by your browser. Use by the iFrames to check any update, if there is an update, the iFrame reloads. If not specified, the iFrames will never try to reload. Also used by the button to set the task done, if not provided, the button will not appear.
parameters.name: api_url

parameters.description: Filter movies get from Radarr. Can be 'inCinemas', 'physical', 'digital', or multiple separated by comma. Defaults to 'inCinemas,physical,digital'
parameters.name: radarrReleaseType

parameters.description: Specify if show unmonitored media. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: showUnmonitored

parameters.description: Specify if show the episodes' (Sonarr) release hour and minute. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: showEpisodesHour

get.description: Returns an iFrame with Overseerr and Jellyseerr media requests list. Returns all requests if the user's API token has the ADMIN or MANAGE_REQUESTS permissions. Otherwise, only the logged-in user's requests are returned. Using the query argument `showMedia=true` will return the media data instead of the requests and media data. You can combine it with `filter=allavaliable` and `sort=mediaAdded` to show the downloaded media sorted by download date, like the first row in Overseerr/Jellyseerr UI "Recently Added".

parameters.description: Homarr theme, defaults to light. If it's different from your Homarr theme, the background turns white
parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: API URL used by your browser. Use by the iFrames to check any update, if there is an update, the iFrame reloads. If not specified, the iFrames will never try to reload. Also used by the button to set the task done, if not provided, the button will not appear.
parameters.name: api_url

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Filters for request status and media status. Available values: all, approved, available, pending, processing, unavailable, failed, deleted, completed, allavaliable (showMedia=true). Defaults to all
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Available values: added, modified, mediaAdded (showMedia=true). Defaults to added
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: If specified, only requests from that particular overseerr user ID will be returned.
parameters.name: requestedByOverseerr

parameters.description: If specified, only requests from that particular jellyseerr user ID will be returned.
parameters.name: requestedByJellyseerr

parameters.description: If true, shows the requests' media data, not the requests and media data. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: showMedia

get.description: Returns a message saying that this iFrame is not implemented anymore.

Returns an iFrame with Overseerr media requests list. Returns all requests if the user's API token has the ADMIN or MANAGE_REQUESTS permissions. Otherwise, only the logged-in user's requests are returned.

parameters.description: Homarr theme, defaults to light. If it's different from your Homarr theme, the background turns white
parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: API URL used by your browser. Use by the iFrames to check any update, if there is an update, the iFrame reloads. If not specified, the iFrames will never try to reload. Also used by the button to set the task done, if not provided, the button will not appear.
parameters.name: api_url

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Available values : all, approved, available, pending, processing, unavailable, failed
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Available values : added, modified. Defaults to added
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: If specified, only requests from that particular user ID will be returned.
parameters.name: requestedBy

get.description: Returns an iFrame with Uptime Kuma sites overview.

parameters.description: You need to create a status page in Uptime Kuma and select which sites/services this status page will show. While creating the status page, it'll request **you** to create a slug, after creating the status page, provide this slug here. This iFrame will show data only of the sites/services of this specific status page!
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Homarr theme, defaults to light. If it's different from your Homarr theme, the background turns white
parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: API URL used by your browser. Use by the iFrames to check any update, if there is an update, the iFrame reloads. If not specified, the iFrames will never try to reload.
parameters.name: api_url

parameters.description: Show the title 'Uptime Kuma' on the iFrame.
parameters.name: showTitle

parameters.description: Orientation of the containers, defaults to horizontal.
parameters.name: orientation

get.description: Returns an iFrame with not done Vikunja tasks. Uses a custom sort/order: due date (asc); end date (asc); priority (desc); created date (desc). When the due/end date is today, the date color will be orange, if it's past due, the date color will be red.

parameters.description: Homarr theme, defaults to light. If it's different from your Homarr theme, the background turns white
parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Project ID to get tasks from. You can get it by going to the project page in Vikunja, the project ID should be on the URL. Example project page URL: https://vikunja.com/projects/2, the project ID is 2. Inbox tasks = 1, Favorite tasks = -1.
parameters.name: project_id

parameters.description: Project IDs to NOT get tasks from. You can get it by going to the project page in Vikunja, the project ID should be on the URL. Example project page URL: https://vikunja.com/projects/2, the project ID is 2. Inbox tasks = 1, Favorite tasks = -1.
parameters.name: exclude_project_ids

parameters.description: API URL used by your browser. Use by the iFrames to check any update, if there is an update, the iFrame reloads. If not specified, the iFrames will never try to reload. Also used by the button to set the task done, if not provided, the button will not appear (the button doesn't appear in repeating tasks.)
parameters.name: api_url

parameters.description: Shows the tasks' created date. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: showCreated

parameters.description: Shows the tasks' due/end date and repeating dates. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: showDue

parameters.description: Shows the tasks' priority. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: showPriority

parameters.description: Shows the tasks' project. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: showProject

parameters.description: Shows a start icon in favorite tasks. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: showFavoriteIcon

parameters.description: Shows the tasks' labels. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: showLabels

parameters.description: Background position of each task card. Use '%25' in place of '%', like '50%25 47.2%25' to get '50% 47.2%'. Defaults to 50% 49.5%.
parameters.name: background_position

parameters.description: Background size of each task card. Use '%25' in place of '%'. Defaults to 105%.
parameters.name: background_size

parameters.description: Background filter of each task card. Use '%25' in place of '%'. Defaults to brightness(0.3).
parameters.name: background_filter

patch.description: Set a Vikunja task as done.

parameters.description: The task ID.
parameters.name: taskId
